title: "WORKIN' on a Mystery, GOIN' Wherever It Leads ..."
body_text:
C30 MAIN EVENT:
MEGILL & C. ADAMS Square Off!
There is just no stopping either of these two semi-trucks from colliding on this
Road to 30
!
Months of boiling anticipation have finally come to a head!
EastCoastDodgeball
takes great pride in producing this magnificant, soon-to-be-classic encounter when, for the very first time ever, legend
Kevin Megill
wages war with legend
Chris Adams
!
KEVIN MEGILL
He's the one and only, mentally prepared and physically equipped for arguably the fight of his career. Making his milestone 101st appearance at an
EastCoastDodgeball
event, the rocket-fueled southpaw, just from his captains record alone, may be the heavy favorite heading in to DODGEBALL C30.
CHRIS ADAMS
The founder of
BoxBall Dodgeball
enters his 113th melee and chances are, all that wealth of experience will be unleashed like only the "The Axe" knows how. Like his C30 counterpart, this multi-time Season Finale headliner will be one tough ombre to deal with.
It's All About Respect
There wouldn't be a Pierce, a Tronolone, a Krott, a Fitzpatrick, or another Adams without either of these two emulated icons. They are yardsticks, blueprints if you will, of this sport and C30 is a well-deserved reward for all of their sacrifices and commitment to the game and the warriors they helped create.
And so with that said,
EastCoastDodgeball
once again gives you a match for the ages, a clash of titans, on one extraordinary night -
Kevin Megill
versus
Chris Adams
for all the marbles on March 15.
Money $$ Talks
Bragging rights
and
a little dough? Sounds pretty sweet!
EastCoastDodgeball
proudly introduces yet another first, the "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest! Set at a measly
$1 Entry Fee
, participants of DODGEBALL C30 will have the opportunity to partake in the classic pregame competition. And to the winner goes the pot! It's that simple!
The Favorites?
Will headliner Ryan Letsche continue to ascend the ranks, winning a record-setting fourth contest of this kind? Will the young bucks from DODGEBALL 129, Vetrano or Pellecchia, prove their dominance once again? What about Captain Chris Adams, a former two-time contest winner himself?
Catch this exciting prematch showdown on March 15, 2008.
And of Course ...
Season 14 Announcements
Put those rumors to rest! What's in store for Season 14? Attend C30 to find out.
The Sound
Tradition is such an integral part at every season finale spectacular and DODGEBALL C30 is no exception. A special musical soundtrack, complete with official theme song "Runnin' Down a Dream" by Tom Petty & the Heartbreakers, has been produced for your listening pleasure.
Fun Afterwards
An event of this magnitude doesn't end prematurely. Come on out and celebrate over two and a half years of the game well-over 300 people have partaken. Pete & Elda's in Neptune hosts this fun-filled gathering immediately after the conclusion of C30.
Season 13 Finale
DODGEBALL C30
March 15, 2008
Wall High School
Special Start Time: 6pm
body_html:
C30 MAIN EVENT:
MEGILL & C. ADAMS Square Off!
There is just no stopping either of these two semi-trucks from colliding on this Road to 30 !

Months of boiling anticipation have finally come to a head! EastCoastDodgeball takes great pride in producing this magnificant, soon-to-be-classic encounter when, for the very first time ever, legend Kevin Megill wages war with legend Chris Adams!

KEVIN MEGILL
He's the one and only, mentally prepared and physically equipped for arguably the fight of his career. Making his milestone 101st appearance at an EastCoastDodgeball event, the rocket-fueled southpaw, just from his captains record alone, may be the heavy favorite heading in to DODGEBALL C30.

CHRIS ADAMS
The founder of BoxBall Dodgeball enters his 113th melee and chances are, all that wealth of experience will be unleashed like only the "The Axe" knows how. Like his C30 counterpart, this multi-time Season Finale headliner will be one tough ombre to deal with.

It's All About Respect
There wouldn't be a Pierce, a Tronolone, a Krott, a Fitzpatrick, or another Adams without either of these two emulated icons. They are yardsticks, blueprints if you will, of this sport and C30 is a well-deserved reward for all of their sacrifices and commitment to the game and the warriors they helped create.

And so with that said, EastCoastDodgeball once again gives you a match for the ages, a clash of titans, on one extraordinary night - Kevin Megill versus Chris Adams for all the marbles on March 15.

Money $$ Talks
Bragging rights and a little dough? Sounds pretty sweet!

EastCoastDodgeball proudly introduces yet another first, the "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest! Set at a measly $1 Entry Fee, participants of DODGEBALL C30 will have the opportunity to partake in the classic pregame competition. And to the winner goes the pot! It's that simple!

The Favorites?
Will headliner Ryan Letsche continue to ascend the ranks, winning a record-setting fourth contest of this kind? Will the young bucks from DODGEBALL 129, Vetrano or Pellecchia, prove their dominance once again? What about Captain Chris Adams, a former two-time contest winner himself?

Catch this exciting prematch showdown on March 15, 2008.

And of Course ...
Season 14 Announcements
Put those rumors to rest! What's in store for Season 14? Attend C30 to find out.

The Sound
Tradition is such an integral part at every season finale spectacular and DODGEBALL C30 is no exception. A special musical soundtrack, complete with official theme song "Runnin' Down a Dream" by Tom Petty & the Heartbreakers, has been produced for your listening pleasure.

Fun Afterwards
An event of this magnitude doesn't end prematurely. Come on out and celebrate over two and a half years of the game well-over 300 people have partaken. Pete & Elda's in Neptune hosts this fun-filled gathering immediately after the conclusion of C30.

Season 13 Finale
DODGEBALL C30
March 15, 2008
Wall High School
Special Start Time: 6pm
